When sending a file to a recipient, you use the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService] to call [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/upload(_:)] and use the metadata returned by that method to create a message of this type. When receiving a file, you handle messages of this type in the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/incomingMessageNotifications] asynchronous sequence, and use the received message to create a [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/FileDownloadRequest] for use with [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/download(_:)].

# RCSMessage.FileTransfer

**Structure**

A structure that represents file transfer content in an RCS message.

## Declaration

```swift
struct FileTransfer
```

## Overview

When sending a file to a recipient, you use the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService] to call [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/upload(_:)] and use the metadata returned by that method to create a message of this type. When receiving a file, you handle messages of this type in the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/incomingMessageNotifications] asynchronous sequence, and use the received message to create a [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/FileDownloadRequest] for use with [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSService/download(_:)].

## Creating a file transfer instance

- **init(fileMetadata:thumbnailMetadata:)**: Creates a file transfer content instance with the given metadata.
- **RCSFileTransferMetadata**: A structure that contains metadata about an RCS file transfer.

## Accessing file transfer properties

- **fileMetadata**: Metadata for the transferred file.
- **thumbnailMetadata**: Metadata for the transferred thumbnail.

## Sending messages

- **sendMessage(_:to:using:messageID:)**: Sends a text message to a specified destination.
- **RCSMessage.Text**: A structure that represents text content in an RCS message.
- **sendMessage(_:to:using:messageID:)**: Sends a file transfer message to a specified destination.
- **sendMessage(_:to:using:messageID:)**: Sends a composing indicator message to a specified destination.
- **RCSMessage.ComposingIndicator**: A structure that represents RFC 3994 composing indicator content in an RCS message.
- **sendMessage(_:to:using:messageID:)**: Sends a geolocation push message to a specified destination.
- **RCSMessage.GeolocationPush**: A structure that represents geolocation push content in an RCS message.
- **sendMessage(_:to:using:messageID:group:)**: Sends the disposition for an incoming message.
- **RCSMessage.DispositionNotification**: A structure that represents disposition notification content in an RCS message, such as whether delivery succeeded or failed.
- **RCSHandle**: An enumeration that represents an RCS destination or sender.
- **CellularServiceID**: An opaque identifier that represents the cellular service for which to provide operations.
- **RCSMessageID**: A structure that represents an RCS message identifier.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
